title: AAFP is Starting a ranked team (No Requirements)
body:
Team:
ADC: MaxXx
Support: OoMPa LoOmPa970
Mid: WOXXlE
Jungle: Henwar
Top: JasonWazza

Subs:
ThePorkHunt
WhitePumah


~~We are currently looking for a dedicated mid and jungle and would prefer if these are your **main** roles.~~

~~We need to find a good team composition so will probably go through a few tryouts, and are looking for people who can be dedicated to our team and their lane. We are also looking for people that want to improve themselves and their game, and so you must be able to admit your faults and listen to other peoples feedback, age does not matter, rank does not matter, we just need **dedicated** players.~~
~~(this being said, we dont want to limit you, and you can still play with friends)~~

**Our Goal:**
***-*** Run regular training matches in normals (3-4 times a week probably in the evenings because of work and school)
***-*** Improve our game-play and those of our team-mates
***-*** Get a decent rank as a team, and work on pushing it further over the rest of the season.
***-*** Play ranked games as a 5v5 team (3-4 times a week, and also in the evenings)

Times for training and ranked games will be able to be discussed once the team has been filled, but make sure you have the evenings spare (between **4-6 AEST** and **8-12 AEST**)

If you are interested Contact me ingame: **MaxXx**
or on our Teamspeak: **ts.aafpservers.net:10225**

Or you can reply here with your ingame name and interest.


We are currently full.

replies.body: I'll apply for ADC and i'm really keen to play with a team. Contact me if u guys have space or want a sub :)
I'll apply for jungle if you still have space.
I can join as jungle or mid but the problem is I don't main anything but I don't play a lot on weekdays. I'm happy to join as a person to play on weekends or even a sub
